mapper.insert: insert into comments(post_id, user_id, parent_id, content, status, created_at, updated_at) values(#{postId}, #{userId}, #{parentId}, #{content}, #{status}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select id, post_id, user_id, parent_id, content, status, created_at, updated_at from comments where post_id = #{postId} and status = 'VISIBLE' order by created_at asc
